data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bravo, Freddy, Cordeiro, Danilo, Chagas, Cinthia (2006): Two new species and new records of Psychoda Latreille (Diptera: Psychodidae: Psychodinae) from Brazil, with comments on supraspecific classification of the genus. Zootaxa 1298: 1-15, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173590
